required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase II Study Evaluating the Efficacy of Enzalutamide and the Role of ARv7 in Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer (mCRPC) Patients With Visceral Disease.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Study Evaluating the Efficacy of Enzalutamide and the Role of ARv7 in Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer (mCRPC) Patients With Visceral Disease.

lead_sponsor.agency: Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale dei Tumori, Milano

clinical_study.source: Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale dei Tumori, Milano

brief_summary.textblock: Open label, single arm, phase II multicentre study designed to determine the clinical benefit, as measured by 3-months disease control rate (DCR) provided by enzalutamide in metastatic Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer patients with at least one visceral site involvement.

primary_outcome.description: To determine the clinical benefit, as measured by 3 months disease control rate (DCR) provided by enzalutamide in mCRPC patients with visceral disease.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety of the treatment per NCI-CTCA v. 4.0
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the safety of the treatment according to NCI-CTCA v. 4.0
To evaluate quality of life as assessed by EQ-5D-5L e FACT-P questionnaire
To evaluate pain as assessed by BPI-SF questionnaire

arm_group.description: All subjects will receive open label enzalutamide 160 mg (4 x 40 mg capsules), orally once daily.

intervention.description: Enzalutamide 160 mg (4 x 40 mg capsules), orally once daily

overall_official.affiliation: Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale Tumori Milano

reference.citation: Astellas Pharma Ltd. Xtandi (enzalutamide) 40mg soft capsules. Summary of Product Characteristics. 26 June 2013.
